release.description: Release publishable packages in an Nx Workspace

allow-ivy.name: allow-ivy
allow-ivy.description: Allow publishing Angular packages built for Ivy

dry-run.name: dry-run
dry-run.description: Dry run, don't make permanent changes

args.name: version
args.description: The version you want to release in semver format (eg: 1.2.3-beta.4)
